General.Name: Shenzhen Cotran New Material Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Shenzhen Cotran New Material Co.,Ltd. manufactures and provides waterproof and sealing insulation products and solutions in China. It offers cold shrink, tape, site materials, fireproof sealing, electric power, pipeline anticorrosion, and liquid cooling products. The company provides its solution for telecom, power, anticorrosive, and fireproofing industries. Shenzhen Cotran New Material Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 2 and No. 3 workshops, Shenzhen, China, 518107
